<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/57c339569e96725e24e79944bf99f70c50afb5b1|patch 8.2.0333: terminal in popup test is flaky>
patch 8.2.0333: terminal in popup test is flaky

Problem:    Terminal in popup test is flaky.
Solution:   Make sure redraw is done before opening the popup.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0333: terminal in popup test is flaky · vim/vim@57c3395
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0333: terminal in popup test is flaky · vim/vim@57c3395
attachments.text: Problem: Terminal in popup test is flaky. Solution: Make sure redraw is done before opening the popup.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dd58923c6bcb026de7134d9874e69e0a2b01682d|patch 8.2.0334: abort called when using test_void()>
patch 8.2.0334: abort called when using test_void()

Problem:    Abort called when using test_void(). (Dominique Pelle)
Solution:   Only give an error, don't abort.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0334: abort called when using test_void() · vim/vim@dd58923
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0334: abort called when using test_void() · vim/vim@dd58923
attachments.text: Problem: Abort called when using test_void(). (Dominique Pelle) Solution: Only give an error, don't abort.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cc390ff5b2c8725c55b961b24322c470659ede9f|patch 8.2.0335: no completion for :disassemble>
patch 8.2.0335: no completion for :disassemble

Problem:    No completion for :disassemble.
Solution:   Make completion work.  Also complete script-local functions if the
            name starts with "s:".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0335: no completion for :disassemble · vim/vim@cc390ff
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0335: no completion for :disassemble · vim/vim@cc390ff
attachments.text: Problem: No completion for :disassemble. Solution: Make completion work. Also complete script-local functions if the name starts with "s:".

patch 8.2.0337: build fails on a few systems

Solution:   Use vim_snprintf() instead of snprintf().

patch 8.2.0339: Vim9: function return type may depend on arguments

Problem:    Vim9: function return type may depend on arguments.
Solution:   Instead of a fixed return type use a function to figure out the
            return type.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0339: Vim9: function return type may depend on arguments · vim/vim@fbdd08e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: function return type may depend on arguments. Solution: Instead of a fixed return type use a function to figure out the return type.
